content: at the join one stitch will be decreased on every sixth ridge repeat these six ridges until you only have three stitches left from now on knit the first outside stitch of every ridge rather than slipping it at two stitches work five more joining ridges i know they re tiny and then slip both stitches knitwise and join fasten_off and darn in the tail to the end of the next couple of ridges on the hat 6 as this hat is knitted as a spiral it won t be completely regular in shape and you won t be able to fold up one ten stitch strip all round for the brim just pull the hat on and turn up the bottom for the fit you want it doesn t look as stylish as this once it s actually on … or maybe that s just that i look odd in hats anyway it s warm and it s fun to knit abbreviations k knit kf&b knit into the front and back of the stitch sl 2 decrease kwise slip two stitches together knitwise w&t wrap and turn see page 2 join see page 3 © frankie brown © 2024 mypatterns areforpersonaluseonlyandshouldnotbeusedtoknititems forsale pleasedonotusethemforteachingpurposes withoutmypermission 7
